0: RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING FILIPINO TENNIS JUNIOR CHAMPION ALEXANDRA "ALEX" EALA FOR WINNING THE AUSTRALIAN OPEN JUNIORS' DOUBLES TITLE HELD IN MELBOURNE PARK, AUSTRALIA ON JANUARY 31, 2020
mother-bill statusstatus: Adopted as Resolution No. HR00062 on 2020-06-04 Substituted by HR00783
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00708
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING FILIPINO TENNIS JUNIOR CHAMPION ALEXANDRA "ALEX" EALA FOR WINNING THE AUSTRALIAN OPEN JUNIORS' DOUBLES TITLE HELD IN MELBOURNE PARK, AUSTRALIA ON JANUARY 31, 2020
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MARTINEZ, ERIC M.
DATE FILED : 2020-02-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-03-04
          -The body directed the Secretariat to prepare a resolution, in substitution to HR Nos. 701, 708 and 740, including its corresponding committee report.
          -Initial deliberation of House Resolution Nos. 701, 708 and 740 (Commending Alexandra M. Eala for winning the first junior grand slam title in 2020 Australian Open)
MOTHER BILL: HR00783
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2020-02-17
